collection.dish_description: Creamy pasta with pancetta and a touch of parmesan.
Classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce.
Persian Barley, Herb and Bean Pottage
Kebabs consist of cut up ground meat, sometimes with vegetables and various other accompaniments according to the specific recipe.

This One Pot Spaghetti recipe has a flavorful meat sauce that you can make with a jar of sauce or my homemade marinara recipe! This recipe uses simple seasonings and a dab of cream cheese for a finishing touch!
